languages.text: "Верно. На вашем столичном мире действует Лекс Даргонус, написанный поколениями фон Валанциус. Но Лекс Империалис — последняя инстанция любых судебных споров. Он выше юридических установок любой планеты, поскольку исходит от самого Императора".

"It does. Your capital world operates under the Lex Dargonus, formed over many generations of the von Valancius line. However, the Lex Imperialis is the final word in every debate. It stands above any legal directives a planet may have, for it comes from the Emperor Himself."
languages.original_text: "Верно. На вашем столичном мире действует Лекс Даргонус, написанный поколениями фон Валанциус. Но Лекс Империалис — последняя инстанция любых судебных споров. Он выше юридических установок любой планеты, поскольку исходит от самого Императора".

"It does. Your capital world operates under the Lex Dargonus, formed over many generations of the von Valancius line. However, the Lex Imperialis is the final word in every debate. It stands above any legal directives a planet may have, for it comes from the Emperor Himself."

languages.text: 「いかにも。あなたの首都惑星は、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の先祖代々によって築かれたレックス・ダルゴナスの下で運営されています。ですが、レックス・インペリアこそが、あらゆる議論における最終判断なのです。レックス・インペリアリは惑星ごとの法令の上位に立ちます。なぜなら、それは皇帝陛下ご自身から発せられたものだからです」
languages.original_text: "It does. Your capital world operates under the Lex Dargonus, formed over many generations of the von Valancius line. However, the Lex Imperialis is the final word in every debate. It stands above any legal directives a planet may have, for it comes from the Emperor Himself."

traits.locale_text: 「いかにも。あなたの首都惑星は、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の先祖代々によって築かれたレックス・ダルゴナスの下で運営されています。ですが、レックス・インペリアこそが、あらゆる議論における最終判断なのです。レックス・インペリアリは惑星ごとの法令の上位に立ちます。なぜなら、それは皇帝陛下ご自身から発せられたものだからです」

languages.text: "Richtig. Eure Hauptwelt folgt dem Lex Dargonus, das vor vielen Generationen von der Linie derer von Valancius geschaffen wurde. Trotzdem hat das Lex Imperia bei allen Debatten das letzte Wort. Es steht über sämtlichen Gesetzesvorschriften eines Planeten, weil es vom Imperator selbst kommt."
languages.original_text: "It does. Your capital world operates under the Lex Dargonus, formed over many generations of the von Valancius line. However, the Lex Imperialis is the final word in every debate. It stands above any legal directives a planet may have, for it comes from the Emperor Himself."

traits.locale_text: "Richtig. Eure Hauptwelt folgt dem Lex Dargonus, das vor vielen Generationen von der Linie derer von Valancius geschaffen wurde. Trotzdem hat das Lex Imperia bei allen Debatten das letzte Wort. Es steht über sämtlichen Gesetzesvorschriften eines Planeten, weil es vom Imperator selbst kommt."

languages.text: « C'est vrai. Votre monde-capitale dépend de la Lex Dargonus, façonnée par de nombreuses générations de la dynastie von Valancius. Cependant, la Lex Imperialis supplante toutes ces autres lois. Elle surpasse toute directive légale pouvant avoir cours sur une planète, car elle a été écrite par l'Empereur Lui-même. »
languages.original_text: "It does. Your capital world operates under the Lex Dargonus, formed over many generations of the von Valancius line. However, the Lex Imperialis is the final word in every debate. It stands above any legal directives a planet may have, for it comes from the Emperor Himself."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai. Votre monde-capitale dépend de la Lex Dargonus, façonnée par de nombreuses générations de la dynastie von Valancius. Cependant, la Lex Imperialis supplante toutes ces autres lois. Elle surpasse toute directive légale pouvant avoir cours sur une planète, car elle a été écrite par l'Empereur Lui-même. »

languages.text: «Así es. Su mundo capital opera bajo la Lex Dargonus, establecida a lo largo de numerosas generaciones de la casa von Valancius. Sin embargo, la Lex Imperialis es la última palabra en todo debate. Tiene preferencia sobre toda directiva legal que exista en un planeta, pues proviene del mismísimo Emperador».
languages.original_text: "It does. Your capital world operates under the Lex Dargonus, formed over many generations of the von Valancius line. However, the Lex Imperialis is the final word in every debate. It stands above any legal directives a planet may have, for it comes from the Emperor Himself."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Su mundo capital opera bajo la Lex Dargonus, establecida a lo largo de numerosas generaciones de la casa von Valancius. Sin embargo, la Lex Imperialis es la última palabra en todo debate. Tiene preferencia sobre toda directiva legal que exista en un planeta, pues proviene del mismísimo Emperador».

languages.text: “确实如此，你的首都世界依照达戈努斯律法运转，这部律法是在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝许多代统治之下逐渐成型的。不过，帝国律法是所有律法的最终解释，高于所有行星的一切律法，因为帝国律法是帝皇亲自制定的。”
languages.original_text: "It does. Your capital world operates under the Lex Dargonus, formed over many generations of the von Valancius line. However, the Lex Imperialis is the final word in every debate. It stands above any legal directives a planet may have, for it comes from the Emperor Himself."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，你的首都世界依照达戈努斯律法运转，这部律法是在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝许多代统治之下逐渐成型的。不过，帝国律法是所有律法的最终解释，高于所有行星的一切律法，因为帝国律法是帝皇亲自制定的。”

languages.text: "Evet, var. Sizin başkent dünyanız, von Valancius soyunun pek çok nesli ardından oluşturulan Lex Dargonus altında faaliyet gösterir. Ancak Lex İmperialis'in takdiri her tartışmanın son sözüdür. Bu söz, bizzat İmparator'dan geldiğinden bir gezegenin sahip olabileceği her türlü yasal emrin üzerindedir."
languages.original_text: "It does. Your capital world operates under the Lex Dargonus, formed over many generations of the von Valancius line. However, the Lex Imperialis is the final word in every debate. It stands above any legal directives a planet may have, for it comes from the Emperor Himself."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, var. Sizin başkent dünyanız, von Valancius soyunun pek çok nesli ardından oluşturulan Lex Dargonus altında faaliyet gösterir. Ancak Lex Imperialis'in takdiri her tartışmanın son sözüdür. Bu söz, bir gezegenin sahip olabileceği her türlü yasal emrin üzerindedir, zira bizzat İmparator'dan gelmektedir."

languages.original_text: "It does. Your capital world operates under the Lex Dargonus, formed over many generations of the von Valancius line. However, the Lex Imperialis is the final word in every debate. It stands above any legal directives a planet may have, for it comes from the Emperor Himself."
